MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH27 and EH54 postcode areas of Kirknewton and Livingston. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.27AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair grounded overhead lines near Heatherlands Farm. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 5.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12.43PM on 05 December 2020.
